      • hit

        public Velocity hit(Ball hitter,
           Point collisionPoint,
           Velocity currentVelocity)
        Notify the object that we collided with it at collisionPoint with a given velocity. The return is the new velocity expected after the hit (based on the force the object inflicted on us).
        Specified by:
        hit in interface Collidable
        Parameters:
        hitter - the hitting ball
        collisionPoint - the point of collision
        currentVelocity - the current velocity of the hitting object
        Returns:
        the new velocity expected after the hit
